definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A continuous stream of negativity that we file away in our memory and ultimately ignore.
sentences.chinese: 一系列的消極性會被我們的大腦歸檔並最終被忽視。

sentences.english: Sometimes if we analyze and examine our own negativity it does nothing to reduce it.
sentences.chinese: 剖析和省察我們的消極性有時候並不能降低其程度。

sentences.english: It hasn’t swung into the confidence column yet, but the negativity is lowering.
sentences.chinese: 信心雖然還沒有恢復，但消極性正在減小。

sentences.english: Then all the negativity feeds on each other and the animosity grows.
sentences.chinese: 然後所有這些消極性會侵蝕彼此，讓敵意滋長。

sentences.english: They will soon get tired of your refusal to respond to their negativity.
sentences.chinese: 他們很快會對你們拒絕迴應他們的消極性感到厭倦。
